Package dynamo.nodeutilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamoLogger
    Useful to select what to show during the execution, in order to avoid verbose information
    Item
    Represents the basic item we want to store and manage
    Peer
    Represents a single Peer for each Node in the system
    Ring
    The representation of the current network, as a ring; it contains the Nodes and the logic operations that can be performed on the ring
    Storage
    The storage where all Items for which a particular node is responsible are stored
    Utilities
    Contains methods useful to setup the system and maintain its consistency
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DynamoLogger.LOG_LEVEL
